components.description:
A yellow face with small, open eyes and an open frown. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey mild sadness, disappointment, concern, and amazement.

An early Microsoft design showed a face with its eyebrows contorted in anger.
components.title: Frowning Face with Open Mouth

description:
A yellow face with small, open eyes and an open frown. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey mild sadness, disappointment, concern, and amazement.

An early Microsoft design showed a face with its eyebrows contorted in anger.
title: Frowning Face with Open Mouth

version.description: A small update to the much larger Unicode 6.0. Unicode 6.1 included 13 new emoji characters.

emoji_net_data.definition: Face with open eyes and open mouth. The Apple artwork for this emoji looks like a person yawning. Google and Microsoftâ€™s artworkÂ appear clos http://emojipedia.org/frowning-face-with-open-mouth/
emoji_net_data.name: frowning face with open mouth

bn:00112813a: Experiencing or marked by or causing sadness or sorrow or discontent

bn:00082447v: To disturb with fear; to throw into a state of alarm or fright; to affright; to terrify.

bn:00088599v: To look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval.
Look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval

bn:00036672n: Wrinkling of the brows or face.
A frown is a facial expression in which the eyebrows are brought together, and the forehead is wrinkled, usually indicating displeasure, sadness or worry, or less often confusion or concentration.
A facial expression of dislike or displeasure
The wrinkling of the brows or face in frowning; the expression of displeasure, sullenness, or discontent in the countenance; an angry frown.
A facial expression in which the eyebrows are brought together, and the forehead is wrinkled, usually indicating displeasure, sadness or worry, or less often confusion or concentration.
